26.text: Throughout this document, AT&T Inc. is referred to as “AT&T.” On June 24, 2020, AT&T closed its sale of $1,050,000,000 principal amount of its 3.750% Global Notes due 2050 (the “Notes”) pursuant to the Underwriting Agreement, dated June 16, 2020, between AT&T and Deutsche Bank AG, Taipei Branch, Morgan Stanley Taiwan Limited and Standard Chartered Bank (Taiwan) Limited, as the several Underwriters. The Notes were issued pursuant to that certain Indenture, dated as of May 15, 2013, between AT&T and The Bank of New York Mellon Trust Company, N.A., as Trustee. The Notes have been registered under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended pursuant to a Registration Statement on Form S-3 (No. 333-231404) previously filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission under the Securities Act. Copies of the Underwriting Agreement, the form of Notes and the opinion of our Vice President – Associate General Counsel and Assistant Secretary as to the validity of the Notes are filed as exhibits hereto and incorporated herein by reference. AT&T is filing this Current Report on Form 8-K so as to file with the Securities and Exchange Commission certain items that are to be incorporated by reference into its Registration Statement.

27.text: On June 23, 2020, AT&T and certain of its subsidiaries issued notices for the redemption in full of all of the outstanding (i) $1,456,834,000 aggregate certain of its principal amount of the 3.000% Global Notes due February 15, 2022 issued by AT&T (CUSIP No. 00206RBD3), (ii) $1,250,000,000 aggregate principal amount of the 3.200% Global Notes due March 1, 2022 issued by AT&T (CUSIP No. 00206RDN9), (iii) $1,012,016,000 aggregate principal amount of the 3.800% Global Notes due March 15, 2022 issued by AT&T (CUSIP No. 00206RDB5), (iv) $422,057,000 aggregate principal amount of the 4.000% Global Notes due January 15, 2022 issued by AT&T (CUSIP No. 00206RHL9), (vi) $60,339,000 aggregate principal amount of the 3.800% Senior Notes due March 15, 2022 issued by DIRECTV Holdings LLC and DIRECTV Financing Co., Inc. (CUSIP No. 25459HBF1) and (vi) $62,580,000 aggregate principal amount of the 4.00% Notes due January 15, 2022 issued by Time Warner, Inc. (CUSIP No. 887317AN5).

28.text: On June 22, 2020, AT&T delivered irrevocable notice to the agent that AT&T plans to prepay on June 26, 2020, all of the $500,000,000 aggregate outstanding principal amount of the Tranche C facility under AT&T’s Term Loan Credit Agreement, dated as of September 20, 2019, with Bank of America, N.A., as agent (the “BAML Term Loan”). After the repayment is applied, all outstanding borrowings and all unpaid fees under the BAML Term Loan will be paid in full and the BAML Term Loan will be terminated in its entirety. On June 22, 2020, AT&T delivered irrevocable notice to the agent that AT&T plans to prepay on June 25, 2020, all of the $500,000,000 aggregate outstanding principal amount of the Term Loan Credit Agreement, dated as of December 4, 2017, with Bank of Communications Co., Ltd., New York Branch, as agent (the “BoComm Term Loan”). After the repayment is applied, all outstanding borrowings and all unpaid fees under the BoComm Term Loan will be paid in full and the BoComm Term Loan will be terminated in its entirety.
